name: I must… Roll the Die...
description:
The game is set, the pieces assembled, a singular Dice will rule your fate, will you survive?

Alone, you find yourself imprisoned at the hands of destiny. The impending weight of life or death compels you to persist. It sees you, hears you, haunts you. Will you face the horrors that envelop you or give in to their desires?

Main Features

Roll the dice to advance, listen to the story that is unraveling and attempt to survive the horrors therein. Dodge malicious entities and close your eyes to avoid those who wish to remain unseen.

Controls

LMB Click - Roll the dice.

Spacebar - Blink/Close your eyes…

A,S,D - Dodge/Lean.

Install instructions

Extract the Zipped folder and run the .exe file.

And turn off your lights for maximum immersion!
